评论概述: Less comfortable than rented ice skates
评论详情: The soles may not have been designed with the human foot in mind. My feet are not picky, but I couldn’t bear to wear these for another minute. Major pressure point near the outside edge just forward of the heel cup. It’s like the arch support went all the way across the midsole. I felt as though I was wearing them on the wrong feet. They were that uncomfortable.

The integrity of the sole is subpar. My 14 year old had a hole in the bottom of his shoe in less than 6 months. And these were his second pair! Same exact thing happened to his first pair, but I figured maybe it was just a fluke and reordered them. I was WRONG.

评论概述: Nice shoe. Good price. Substandard soles.
评论详情: The adidas Daily 3.0 Sneaker are a nice pair of sneakers. I purchased the Dove/Grey. They are stylish, comfortable and fit true to size (US 10.5 in my case). I'm a casual user that works from home. I don't run in these shoes or to any athletic activities in them. I take my dog for a walk twice a day and run errands and attend social gatherings here and there. I'm not very hard on my shoes at all. Unfortunately, after only 6-7 months of use, the soles of the shoes are coming apart, mainly in the heel area. It's very disappointing because the main part of the show is still in great shape and could easily last me another year, but I'm going to have to move on from them because of the sole. I've seen a few other reviews pointing out the same thing.  Overall, it's a nice shoe that you can generally get for around $50. Just keep in mind that they aren't going last you more than a year in most cases. 4/5 stars.

评论概述: Stylish kicks... for Normal sized feet...
评论详情: Got these in "core black/cloud white/core black" size 12...  For those wondering what "core black" is compared to "black"... they're basically charcoal/dark gray. I have another similar style of Addidas (Grand Court 2.0) in black so I'm glad these aren't as dark. As for sizing... they are true to size... no need to size up, BUT.... if you have wide or chubby feet, you may want to consider something else. My feet aren't and although they fit great, there is very little extra room in the toe area. I also wear thin dress socks, so I'm guessing it would be even worse with tube socks. I took a star off for that, but overall these look great and are comfortable on my normal sized feet. YMMV.
Look good, feel good, sturdy. Will Buy again and again.

As a long-time sneaker enthusiast, I recently picked up a pair of men’s Adidas sneakers, and I am thoroughly impressed! Adidas has always been a trusted brand in the athletic footwear category, and these sneakers have reaffirmed that trust with their exceptional quality and performance.  From the moment I slipped these sneakers on, I could feel the comfort. The cushioned insole provides excellent arch support, making them perfect for all-day wear, whether I’m running errands or hitting the gym. The fit is true to size, and the breathable mesh upper allows for great airflow, keeping my feet cool during those long days or intense workouts.  One of the standout features of these Adidas sneakers is their stylish design. They effortlessly blend sporty and casual aesthetics, making them versatile enough to pair with anything from workout gear to jeans. I opted for a classic black and white colorway, which goes with just about everything in my wardrobe. They’re sleek, modern, and have drawn compliments from friends and family!  These sneakers are not just about looks—they perform exceptionally well too. I’ve taken them for runs, to the gym, and even for casual walks, and they handle it all with ease. The supportive sole provides great traction, ensuring I feel stable on various surfaces. They also have excellent shock absorption, which has made a noticeable difference in my comfort level during workouts.  After several weeks of regular use, I’m happy to report that these sneakers show no signs of wear and tear. The materials feel high-quality and resilient, indicating they are built to last. The stitching is strong, and the outsole remains intact, even after intense workouts and outdoor activities.  While Adidas sneakers can be a bit on the pricier side, I believe the quality and performance justify the investment. They provide excellent value for money considering their durability and versatility, making them a worthwhile addition to any sneaker collection.  If you’re in the market for a reliable, stylish, and comfortable pair of sneakers, I wholeheartedly recommend men’s Adidas sneakers. They’ve exceeded my expectations in every aspect, from comfort to performance to design. Whether you’re an athlete or simply looking for a fashionable and functional everyday shoe, these sneakers are sure to become your new favorites. Treat your feet to the quality they deserve with these incredible shoes!

评论概述: Best for Fashion, Not for Long Distance Daily Walks
评论详情: I love these shoes. I've worn them to death over the course of a year since purchasing them. Unfortunately for me, I stomped out, on average, 2.5 miles a day in these things and the treads have disappeared to the point where the air cushion on one foot is visible.  REGARDLESS, I'd recommend these shoes for casual wear. The leather is truly durable and has not torn or discolored unevenly all this time. Just don't treat these as running/walking shoes.
